solution_line_template: After this week, Michelangelo will have {total_ceilings}-{ceilings_painted_this_week}=<<{total_ceilings}-{ceilings_painted_this_week}={ceilings_left_after_this_week}>>{ceilings_left_after_this_week} more ceilings to paint.

Next week, Michelangelo will paint {ceilings_painted_this_week}/{next_week_divisor}=<<{ceilings_painted_this_week}/{next_week_divisor}={ceilings_painted_next_week}>>{ceilings_painted_next_week} ceilings.

Michelangelo will have {ceilings_left_after_this_week}-{ceilings_painted_next_week}=<<{ceilings_left_after_this_week}-{ceilings_painted_next_week}={ceilings_left_after_next_week}>>{ceilings_left_after_next_week} more ceilings to paint.
